title: The tvvoo bookes of Francis Bacon. Of the proficience and aduancement of learning, diuine and humane To the King.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed [by Thomas Purfoot and Thomas Creede] for Henrie Tomes, and are to be sould at his shop at Graies Inne gate in Holborne,
notes: Purfoot printed book 1 and Kk-Rr of book 2; Creede printed Aa-Ii and Eee-Hhh of book 2; another compositor set the rest (STC).
"The second booke of Francis Bacon" has separate foliation and register. Foliation is irregular.
With two final errata leaves following leaf Hhhh2, a blank.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
